text:
Atrium helps passionate entrepreneurs build meaningful companies by providing them with great legal advice. Weâ€™re shaking up the $160B legal industry by building radically better legal services. Our team of entrepreneurs, developers, product managers, and lawyers are dedicated to solving the inefficiencies in the corporate law practice with technology, business innovation, and transparent pricing. We build software that enables our lawyers to provide dramatically more efficient, transparent, and responsive legal services.

We want to scale our team 20% in Q1 for both LLP (Legal Side) and LTS (Management, Eng, Ops...) positions! Apply below or send our link to a friend who would be interested.

Happy New Year!

- The A-Team
